about_the_game: This map pack offers five new sandbox and multiplayer maps for Tropico 5: Enjoy the sights and beautiful scenery of Gran Mano, Isla del Halcon, Costa Siesta, Pesada Cruz and Ultimo!
detailed_description: This map pack offers five new sandbox and multiplayer maps for Tropico 5: Enjoy the sights and beautiful scenery of Gran Mano, Isla del Halcon, Costa Siesta, Pesada Cruz and Ultimo!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x64-Versions of Ubuntu 14.04 LTS & Ubuntu 14.10
  • Processor: AMD or Intel Dual-Core @ 2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 400 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: x64-Versions of Ubuntu 14.04 LTS & Ubuntu 14.10
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAC OS X 10.9.5 (Mountain Lion), 10.9.5 (Mavericks) and 10.10.2 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core @ 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 400 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Quad-Core @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or higher

name: Tropico 5 - Map Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP2, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3GHz Dual-Core or 2.6 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 400 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 4000 or higher, Intel HD 4000 or higher (DirectX 11 hardware support required)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit), Windows 8 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Quad-Core @ 3.8 GHz or Intel Quad-Core @ 3.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500 or higher, AMD Radeon HD 5000 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Penultimo presents: Five new island maps designed for your undisputed rule!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
